metadata.title: CVE-2024-57807 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: megaraid_sas: Fix for a potential deadlockThis fixes a 'possible circular locking dependency detected' warning      CPU0                    CPU1      ----                    ---- lock(&instance->reset_mutex);                              lock(&shost->scan_mutex);                              lock(&instance->reset_mutex); lock(&shost->scan_mutex);Fix this by temporarily releasing the reset_mutex.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
